text: Kagangal is an Indian Tamil-language mystery-drama-musical film written, directed, and produced by Anand Annamalai under Mayavaram Pictures. The movie features Vidharth, Yogi Babu, Lijomol Jose, Kishore, and Guru Somasundaram. == Cast == * Vidharth * Yogi Babu * Lijomol Jose * Kishore * Guru Somasundaram * Shali Nivekas * Ilavarasu * Kitty == References == == Other websites == * Kagangal on IMDb Category:Indian movies Category:Mystery drama movies
title: Kagangal (movie)
